Welcome to the Jan 2026 edition of our Channel Newsletter!

  • Industry News: Market trends and insights

docs.title: Arista in the news - Jan 2026
docs.text:
Key developments in our industry this month:

🤝 Strategic Partnership Expansion Arista and Palo Alto Networks Strengthen Partnership in the New Age of AI Security

Arista Networks and Palo Alto Networks announce enhanced collaboration to deliver comprehensive AI-powered security solutions, combining Arista's high-performance networking with Palo Alto's advanced threat detection capabilities.

🚀 AI Infrastructure Leadership Arista Extends DC AI Leadership with New Platforms, Higher Speed

Arista continues to lead the AI data center market with breakthrough networking platforms delivering unprecedented performance and scale for next-generation AI workloads.

☀️ Scale-Up Ethernet Innovation The Sun Rises on Scale-Up Ethernet

Arista introduces revolutionary scale-up Ethernet architecture, transforming how AI clusters interconnect with breakthrough performance and simplified operations for next-generation computing.

Trend Impact Opportunity AI Security Integration High Enhanced partner solutions combining networking + security Strategic Partnerships High Expanded go-to-market opportunities AI Platform Innovation High New product opportunities for AI infrastructure Scale-Up Ethernet High Revolutionary architecture for AI clusters Market Consolidation Medium Stronger competitive positioning

docs.title: Featured Partner: TechFlow Solutions
docs.text:
"Partnering with Arista has transformed our business. We've gone from a regional player to the go-to AI infrastructure specialist in Texas. The technical excellence of Arista products, combined with their partner support, has enabled us to win deals we never thought possible."

- Sarah Chen, CEO, TechFlow Solutions

Key Achievements:

  • 340% revenue growth year-over-year ($12.3M in Arista revenue)
  • 15 AI clusters deployed with 5,000+ GPUs total
  • 99.97% network uptime across all deployments
  • Premier AI networking specialist in Southwest region

Featured Project: Austin Medical Research Institute - High-performance AI infrastructure for cancer research with 8x faster model training and 60% faster research cycles.

📖 Read Full Success Story →

docs.title: 📋 Newsletter Schedule
docs.text: Next Issue: - Publishing

docs.title: Our Mission
docs.text: The Arista Channel Newsletter serves as the premier communication platform connecting Arista Networks with our valued channel partners and their customers. We deliver timely, relevant, and actionable insights to help our partners succeed in today's rapidly evolving networking landscape.

docs.title: Channel Partners
docs.text:
• Authorized Resellers - Value-added resellers and system integrators
  • Technology Partners - Strategic alliance partners and OEMs
  • Service Providers - Managed service providers and cloud providers
  • Distributors - Regional and global distribution partners

docs.title: End Customers
docs.text:
• Enterprise IT Leaders - CIOs, CTOs, and network architects
  • Data Center Operators - Hyperscale and colocation providers
  • Campus Network Administrators - Education and corporate IT teams
  • AI/ML Infrastructure Teams - High-performance computing specialists

docs.title: 📊 Industry Intelligence
docs.text:
• Market trends and competitive analysis
  • Technology roadmaps and innovation insights
  • Regulatory updates and compliance guidance
  • Investment and acquisition news

docs.title: 🚀 Product Excellence
docs.text:
• New product launches and feature updates
  • Software releases and security advisories
  • Best practices and deployment guides
  • Performance benchmarks and case studies

docs.title: 🌟 Partner Success
docs.text:
• Customer success stories and testimonials
  • Partner spotlight features and achievements
  • Sales enablement tools and resources
  • Training opportunities and certifications

docs.title: 📅 Strategic Events
docs.text:
• Webinars and technical deep-dives
  • Partner conferences and user forums
  • Training workshops and hands-on labs
  • Industry trade shows and networking events

docs.title: Schedule
docs.text:
• Frequency: Monthly publication
  • Release Date: Second Tuesday of each month
  • Format: Digital newsletter with web archive
  • Distribution: Email notification with web access

docs.title: Version Control
docs.text:
Each newsletter issue is permanently archived with version control:

  • Current Issue: Always available at /latest/
  • Archive Access: Browse all previous issues by date
  • Immutable Content: Published issues are read-only
  • Search Capability: Full-text search across all issues

docs.title: Content Quality
docs.text:
• Technical Accuracy: All content reviewed by subject matter experts
  • Relevance: Focus on actionable insights for channel success
  • Timeliness: Current market information and trending topics
  • Clarity: Professional writing accessible to diverse audiences

docs.title: Sources
docs.text:
• Arista Engineering: Direct access to product development teams
  • Field Teams: Real-world insights from customer deployments
  • Partner Feedback: Input from successful channel implementations
  • Industry Analysis: Third-party research and market intelligence

docs.title: Newsletter Team
docs.text: Primary Contact: channel-se@arista.com - Content suggestions and feedback - Partnership opportunities - Technical questions and clarifications

docs.title: Partner Support
docs.text:
Technical Help: partners-techhelp@arista.com - Product support and troubleshooting - Implementation guidance - Training and certification inquiries

Partner Portal: partner.arista.com{target="_blank"} - Access exclusive partner resources - Download sales tools and documentation - Register for partner events and training

docs.title: Data Protection
docs.text:
• Privacy First: We respect subscriber privacy and data protection
  • Opt-in Only: Subscription requires explicit consent
  • Secure Delivery: Encrypted email delivery and secure web access
  • Unsubscribe: Easy one-click unsubscribe option

docs.title: Subscription Management
docs.text:
• Free Access: No cost for channel partners and customers
  • Automatic Updates: Email notifications for new issues
  • Mobile Friendly: Responsive design for all devices
  • Offline Reading: PDF download option available

docs.title: Our Commitment
docs.text:
We are committed to delivering exceptional value to the Arista channel ecosystem. Every issue reflects our dedication to:

  • Partner Success - Providing tools and insights for business growth
  • Customer Satisfaction - Supporting end-user success with Arista solutions
  • Innovation Leadership - Showcasing cutting-edge networking technologies
  • Community Building - Fostering connections within our partner network

Thank you for being part of the Arista channel community. Together, we're building the future of networking.

Questions or suggestions? We welcome your feedback at channel-se@arista.com

docs.title: 📚 Archive Overview
docs.text:
The Arista Channel Newsletter archive provides permanent access to all published issues, enabling partners and customers to:

  • Research Historical Content - Find past product announcements and industry insights
  • Track Technology Evolution - Follow Arista's innovation journey over time
  • Reference Success Stories - Access partner case studies and best practices
  • Review Event History - Browse past training sessions and webinars

docs.title: 2026 Publications
docs.text: Issue Publication Date Status Key Highlights Jan.2026 January 14, 2026 ✅ Current AI partnerships, TechFlow success story, Scale-Up Ethernet Feb.2026 February 11, 2026 🔄 Planned Q1 product releases, partner program updates Mar.2026 March 11, 2026 📅 Scheduled Campus networking focus, spring events

docs.title: Archive Navigation
docs.text: Use the version selector at the top of any page to browse all available issues. Each archived issue is permanently preserved and read-only.

docs.title: Full-Text Search
docs.text:
• Global Search: Use the search function to find content across all newsletter versions
  • Issue-Specific: Search within individual archived issues
  • Topic Filtering: Find articles by product category, partner type, or event type

docs.title: Search Tips
docs.text:
• Use specific product names (e.g., "CloudVision", "Campus", "AI Centers")
  • Search by partner company names for success stories
  • Filter by event types ("webinar", "workshop", "forum")
  • Look for technology trends ("AI", "security", "automation")

docs.text:

docs.text:

docs.title: 🌟 Partner Success Story: TechFlow Solutions
docs.text: Featured Partner Spotlight - January 2026

docs.title: Executive Summary
docs.text: TechFlow Solutions, a leading systems integrator based in Austin, Texas, has achieved remarkable success by leveraging Arista's comprehensive networking portfolio to deliver cutting-edge AI infrastructure solutions. In 2025, they completed three major data center transformations, generating over $12M in revenue while establishing themselves as the premier Arista AI networking specialist in the Southwest region.

docs.title: 🏢 Partner Profile
docs.text: Company TechFlow Solutions Location Austin, Texas Founded 2018 Employees 85+ technical professionals Specialization AI/ML Infrastructure, Data Center Modernization Arista Partnership Premier Partner since 2020 Certifications 12 ACEs, 8 ACIEs, 3 ACMEs

docs.title: Leadership Team
docs.text:
• CEO: Sarah Chen - Former Dell Technologies VP
  • CTO: Marcus Rodriguez - Ex-NVIDIA Infrastructure Architect
  • VP Sales: Jennifer Walsh - 15+ years networking experience

docs.title: Financial Performance
docs.text:
• Revenue Growth: 340% year-over-year
  • Arista Revenue: $12.3M (65% of total business)
  • Project Margins: 28% average (industry: 18%)
  • Customer Retention: 98%

docs.title: Technical Achievements
docs.text:
• Projects Completed: 47 major deployments
  • AI Clusters Deployed: 15 GPU clusters (5,000+ GPUs total)
  • Network Uptime: 99.97% across all deployments
  • Customer Satisfaction: 4.9/5.0 average rating

docs.title: Market Expansion
docs.text:
• New Verticals: Healthcare AI, Financial Services, Research
  • Geographic Growth: Expanded to Dallas, Houston, San Antonio
  • Team Growth: Added 32 technical professionals
  • Certifications: 100% increase in Arista-certified staff

docs.title: 💡 Featured Project: MedTech AI Research Center
Challenge
docs.text:
Austin Medical Research Institute needed a high-performance computing infrastructure to support breakthrough cancer research using AI/ML models. Requirements included:

  • Ultra-low latency for real-time AI inference
  • Massive bandwidth for genomic data processing
  • Zero downtime for critical research operations
  • Scalable architecture for future expansion
  • Compliance with healthcare data regulations

docs.title: Arista Products Deployed
docs.text:
• Spine Layer: 4x Arista 7800R3 (400GbE)
  • Leaf Layer: 16x Arista 7060X5 (100GbE)
  • GPU Fabric: 8x Arista 7368X (400GbE)
  • Management: 2x Arista 7050X3 (25GbE)
  • Software: CloudVision Portal, EOS automation

docs.title: Network Specifications
docs.text:
• Total Bandwidth: 25.6 Tbps aggregate
  • GPU Interconnect: 400GbE per GPU node
  • Storage Network: 100GbE NVMe-oF
  • Latency: <500ns GPU-to-GPU
  • Redundancy: Full N+1 with sub-second failover

docs.title: Implementation Timeline
docs.text:
• Week 1-2: Design validation and equipment staging
  • Week 3-4: Physical installation and cabling
  • Week 5-6: Network configuration and testing
  • Week 7-8: AI workload optimization and go-live

docs.title: For TechFlow Solutions
docs.text:
"Partnering with Arista has transformed our business. We've gone from a regional player to the go-to AI infrastructure specialist in Texas. The technical excellence of Arista products, combined with their partner support, has enabled us to win deals we never thought possible."

— Sarah Chen, CEO, TechFlow Solutions

docs.title: Key Benefits Achieved:
docs.text:
• Revenue Multiplication: 3.4x growth in 12 months
  • Market Leadership: #1 Arista partner in Southwest region
  • Technical Differentiation: Exclusive AI networking expertise
  • Customer Loyalty: 98% retention rate
  • Team Development: Industry-leading certification levels

docs.title: For End Customer (MedTech Research)
docs.text:
"The network TechFlow built for us is simply phenomenal. Our AI models that used to take 48 hours to train now complete in 6 hours. We're accelerating cancer research by months, potentially saving thousands of lives."

— Dr. Michael Thompson, CTO, Austin Medical Research Institute

docs.title: Quantified Results:
docs.text:
• AI Training Speed: 8x faster model training
  • Research Throughput: 300% increase in studies
  • Operational Costs: 40% reduction in compute expenses
  • Time to Discovery: 60% faster research cycles
  • Scalability: Ready for 10x expansion

docs.title: AI-Optimized Network Design
docs.text:
• RDMA over Converged Ethernet (RoCE) for GPU communication
  • Adaptive Load Balancing for optimal traffic distribution
  • Quality of Service (QoS) prioritization for AI workloads
  • Network Telemetry with real-time performance monitoring

docs.title: Automation & Orchestration
docs.text:
• Infrastructure as Code using Arista AVD (Ansible)
  • Zero Touch Provisioning for rapid deployment
  • Automated Compliance checking and reporting
  • Self-Healing Networks with intelligent failover

docs.title: Security & Compliance
docs.text:
• Micro-segmentation for healthcare data isolation
  • Encrypted Communications end-to-end
  • HIPAA Compliance validation and monitoring
  • Audit Trail comprehensive logging

docs.title: Innovation Highlights
docs.text:
# Sample AVD Configuration for AI Cluster
spine:
  defaults:
    platform: 7800R3
    bgp_as: 65000
    loopback_ipv4_pool: 10.0.0.0/27
  nodes:
    - name: spine1
      id: 1
      mgmt_ip: 192.168.1.11/24
    - name: spine2  
      id: 2
      mgmt_ip: 192.168.1.12/24

leaf:
  defaults:
    platform: 7060X5
    spanning_tree_mode: mstp
    mlag: true
  nodes:
    - name: leaf1
      id: 1
      bgp_as: 65001
      mlag_peer: leaf2

— Jennifer Martinez, Regional Sales Director, Arista Networks

docs.title: Network Performance Metrics
docs.text: Metric Achieved Industry Standard Improvement Latency 450ns 2,000ns 78% better Throughput 25.6 Tbps 12.8 Tbps 100% higher Uptime 99.97% 99.9% 7x fewer outages Scalability 10,000 ports 2,000 ports 5x larger Power Efficiency 0.8W/Gbps 1.2W/Gbps 33% more efficient

docs.title: AI Workload Optimization
docs.text:
# Sample performance tuning commands
# GPU-optimized network configuration
interface Ethernet1/1
  description GPU-Node-01
  mtu 9214
  speed forced 400gfull
  flowcontrol send on
  flowcontrol receive on
  priority-flow-control on
  priority-flow-control priority 3 no-drop

# RDMA configuration  
ip access-list RoCE-DSCP
  permit ip any any dscp 26

qos map dscp 26 to traffic-class 3
qos map traffic-class 3 to cos 3

End of Partner Success Story
